Imagery Description: (a) Standing draped woman offers phiale to seated draped woman, with small white bird flying above between them, (b) donkey (or mule) in front of seated draped woman. Lid: (i) lekanis—(a) female head in white, (b) female head in redNon Sepcifiedfigure to left; (ii) globular bottle—decorated in added white.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
